name: Galaxia (NarainR)
description:
Galaxia is a two month project I worked on at New York Film Academy. It is currently in development, this is a beta build.


INSTRUCTIONS:

Input your move. Either move in the direction you are facing, change the direction you are facing, or attack in the direction you are facing. After both players have input moves for their three characters, the characters then move.

EACH UNIT = 5HP

ATTACK = -2HP

MISSED ATTACK = -1HP

KAMAKAZI = Move unit to occupied square to kill both units

Key Binding

Player 1 (Orange)

Move or Face UP

Up Arrow

Move or Face DOWN

Down Arrow

Move or Face LEFT

Left Arrow

Move or Face RIGHT

Right Arrow

Attack

/

Key Binding

Player 2 (Green)

Move or Face UP

w

Move or Face DOWN

a

Move or Face LEFT

s

Move or Face RIGHT

d

Attack

x

Currently a work in progress if you have any suggestion please feel free to leave a comment.

Music created by: Diveakssh Schae
